item.description:
FREE SEMINAR

Feel free to bring guests.

Be your best, to attract your best match!!

Did you ever feel too tired to go out?
Do you have other health problems? Pain, etc? that bring you down at times?

Are you disgusted with clothes that don't fit?
We cover different health issues and how they can increase or decrease quality of life.
Bring a list of your symptoms and we will address them and their cause.

We address both male and female problems: hormones, metabolism, and more
Did you know that cholesterol is a hormone and it balances other hormones.
Your whole body is run by hormone reactions all the time: eating, energy, sleep, body temp., metabolism, pain and much more is controlled by hormones.

This is based on true scientific research since 1972 and how the body works.

Want to be healthier or thinner to attract your lifetime partner?

See you March 31st and bring a notebook.

The instructor is Wellness Practitioner with a Master's Degree, Ph.D. & N.D. (Doctor of Naturopathy) candidate in private practice for 12 yrs. - with over 20 yrs. of relationship coaching

Only yes RSVP's please



This seminar is NOT interactive.

Information is presented by a Health Practitioner, covering over 50 years of combined scientific research.

Offered by a Health Practitioner -Relationship Coach who addresses both physical and emotional issues.
The seminar is gratis. However, the information has taken decades and $ millions to compile and is priceless.

Thank you.
item.name: Lose weight - to meet your mate ( stop aches & pains, too)
